title: Don't be the last to know (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse
description: Introduced by Mike Willesee - this video provides an in-depth look at two Australian families and their fight against drug addiction. Typical families with day to day problems like everyone else - until a serious drug problem surfaced. Addicts and their families speak frankly about their frustration, confusion and the courage needed to fight back. Essential viewing for all parents.
related_objects: Title; 300388; Don't be the last to know; Active; 1987
